-- | Library for using euro currency, italian language
--   
--   ..
@package EuroIT
@version 2010.2.5

module Data.EuroIT
newtype Euro
Euro :: Rational -> Euro
newtype DEuro
DEuro :: (Euro -> Euro) -> DEuro
mkDEuro :: Euro -> DEuro
($^) :: DEuro -> Euro -> Euro
opposite :: DEuro -> DEuro
instance Eq Euro
instance Num Euro
instance Ord Euro
instance Read DEuro
instance Show DEuro
instance Read Euro
instance Show Euro
